reviewText: Everyone should see this.  It is very informative. This is one thing that mankind can't control and it is good to be aware of it.

The previous review is not written for this video, but mistakenly written for "Fire From The Sky".
This video: "Fire From The Sky" is about asteroids, comets and meteorites, which I use in my classroom every year. It is THE BEST account of past, present, and future possibilities of impacts from outer space.
